text: 200px Reko Lundán (2 April 1969 – 27 October 2006) was a Finnish television presenter, writer, screen writer and journalist best known for his work on Aamu-TV in 2003. He had worked with actors such as Pasi Heikura. His novel "Ilman suuria suruja" won the 2002 Helsingin Sanomat Literature Prize for the best debut novel. He died of a brain tumor on 27 October 2006. ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Finnish television presenters
title: Reko Lundán
